overview: In a bleak and oppressive totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, personal freedoms are nonexistent and surveillance is constant. A brilliant mathematician embarks on a forbidden romance with a colleague and becomes involved in a secret resistance movement. Together, they strive to overthrow the oppressive regime and fight for freedom. Yet, in their journey to defy oppression and embrace love, they discover that not everything is as simple as it seems.
tagline: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
